data.meta_site_name: Mary Neal Obituary | April 8, 2022 | Wessels & Wilk Funeral Home - Pleasant Ridge, MI
data.text:
Mary Ann Neal age 78 of Ferndale passed away April 8th. She was the beloved wife of the late Robert, Dear mother of Rob (Dayhna) Neal and Kurt Neal. Grandmother to Gabrielle, Katlyn, Zachary, Jordyn and Haley. Mary Ann Neal is survived by her brother Richard Cunard. She is also survived by her loving sister-in-law, Ms. Judy Cunard, and nieces Dr. Jennifer Cunard Thompson and Ms. Christa Cunard Strout.

A celebration of life service will be held at a later date.
